name: T - Sonia
_source: speak;Sonia; How're you enjoying the ride, Emma? Pretty neat, right?
speak;Emma; When you described the ocean back home, you never said it was so beautiful!
speak;Sonia; Ah, well, maybe I've just seen it too much.{w} You wouldn't describe the sky as special,{w} but I'm sure a person who was raised in a cave would beg to differ.
speak;Emma; It's just one of the most beautiful things I've laid eyes on.
speak;Sonia; If you think this is beautiful, you haven't seen the half of it.{w} I've seen my fair share of beauties in the world.
speak;Sonia; Heh, well, if I told you, then it'd ruin the fun of finding them.
speak;Emma; Aw, but I want to see it all now!
speak;Sonia; Haha! Come back when you've been around like I have!{w} We'll trade tales.
